characteristics.name: Description
characteristics.value: A Meiotic Spore explodes if it is within 3" of any enemy units at the end of any Charge phase. Each time a Meiotic Spore explodes, roll a D6. On a 1 it fails to inflict an harm, on a 2-5 it inflicts D3 mortal wound on the nearest enemy unit, and on a 6 it inflicts D6 mortal wounds on that unit. The Meiotic Spore is then destroyed.
